LanguageData.LumberBirch.label: birch lumber
LanguageData.LumberBirch.description: Processed birch lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Birch is a perishable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberPalm.label: black palm lumber
LanguageData.LumberPalm.description: Processed black palm lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Black palm is a durable wood.
LanguageData.LumberCecropia.label: cecropia lumber
LanguageData.LumberCecropia.description: Processed cecropia lumber. Mostly useful for building simple structures, tools, and simple prosthetics. Cecropia is a nondurable to perishable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberCocoa.label: cocoawood lumber
LanguageData.LumberCocoa.description: Processed cocoawood lumber. Mostly useful for building simple structures and furniture. Cocoawood is a nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberCypress.label: cypress lumber
LanguageData.LumberCypress.description: Processed cypress lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Cypress is a durable softwood.
LanguageData.LumberDrago.label: drago lumber
LanguageData.LumberDrago.description: Processed drago lumber. Mostly useful for building makeshift structures, handicrafts and furniture. Drago is a low durability hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberMaple.label: maple lumber
LanguageData.LumberMaple.description: Processed maple lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Maple is a nondurable to perishable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog.label: mixed lumber
LanguageData.WoodLog.description: Various kinds of processed lumber all bundled together. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. For when you care more about function than form.
LanguageData.LumberOak.label: oak lumber
LanguageData.LumberOak.description: Processed oak lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Oak is a very durable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberPine.label: pine lumber
LanguageData.LumberPine.description: Processed pine lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Pine is a moderate to low durability softwood.
LanguageData.LumberPoplar.label: poplar lumber
LanguageData.LumberPoplar.description: Processed poplar lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Poplar is a nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberTeak.label: teak lumber
LanguageData.LumberTeak.description: Processed teak lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Teak is the most durable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberWillow.label: willow lumber
LanguageData.LumberWillow.description: Processed willow lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Willow is a nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.LumberBamboo.label: bamboo lumber
LanguageData.LumberBamboo.description: Processed bamboo lumber. Mostly useful for building long-lasting, simple structures and furniture. Bamboo is a perishable, fast growing grass.
